# brainy

## Example

```html
<amp-ad
  width="300"
  height="250"
  type="brainy"
  data-aid="10"
  data-slot-id="3347"
>
</amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For configuration details and to generate your tags, contact http://www.opt.ne.jp/contact_detail/id=8.

Supported parameters:

-   `data-aid`
-   `data-slot-id`
